docs.snippet: The career of an eclectic musician spanned decades before what turned out to be a final show in Atlanta, a concert in honor of his birthday.

headline.main: Bruce Hampton, 70, Jam Scene Patriarch, Dies After Collapsing Onstage

docs.snippet: A program to offer developers jobs was flooded with more than 48,000 applications as many in the field look for distance from the political polarization in the United States and Europe.

headline.main: As New Zealand Courts Tech Talent, Isolation Becomes a Draw

docs.snippet: Since President Trump was elected, as political risks have increased at home and abroad, complacency among investors has rarely been so widespread.

headline.print_headline: Political Risks Growing But Investors Stay Put
headline.main: Political Turmoil Is High, but Wall Street’s Fear Gauge Is Very Low

docs.snippet: A pothole leaves the writer stranded on the Palisades Parkway, without a spare but with plenty of time to ponder how she got into this mess.

headline.print_headline: Thanks for Your Service, Pothole Warrior
headline.main: Thanks for Your Service, Pothole Warrior

docs.snippet: The Roundabout Theater Company’s production, directed by Anne Kauffman, has a prominently female cast.

headline.main: ‘Marvin’s Room’ Moves to Broadway With Women Front and Center

docs.snippet: The best rosés hide among the annual deluge of fashionable summer wines. Seek them out and find a delicious reward.

headline.print_headline: 20 Under $20: The Savory Side of Rosé
headline.main: 20 Wines Under $20: The Savory Side of Rosé

docs.snippet: Mr. Steck was preparing to traverse some of the Himalayas’ highest peaks when he died in an accident, though the exact circumstances of the death were unknown.

headline.print_headline: A Renowned Mountain Climber Dies Near Everest
headline.main: Ueli Steck, Renowned Mountain Climber, Dies Near Everest at 40

docs.snippet: Eight men were in custody as British investigators continued to seek a possible bomb maker who may have helped the Manchester bomber.

headline.main: The Latest on the Manchester Bombing Investigation

docs.snippet: Senate Republican leaders released their bill to repeal the Affordable Care Act, even as enough senators to block it declared their opposition.

headline.print_headline: Senate Unveils Health Bill With Deep Medicaid Cuts, Similar to House Version
headline.main: Senate Health Care Bill Includes Deep Cuts to Medicaid

docs.snippet: The magazine’s Ethicist columnist on weighing sacrifice against benefit when trying to aid a colleague or your own grandmother, and more.

headline.print_headline: Should I Help an Unjustly Fired Co-Worker?
headline.main: Should I Help an Unjustly Fired Co-Worker?
